responses.body:
{
  "courseId": "1",
  "modules": [
    {
      "moduleId": "101",
      "moduleTitle": "Introduction to Limits",
      "video": "@/assets/testvideo.mp4",
      "description": "Learn about the concept of limits and their importance in calculus.",
      "isCompleted": true,
      "isBookmarked": false
    },
    {
      "moduleId": "102",
      "moduleTitle": "Understanding Derivatives",
      "video": "@/assets/testvideo.mp4",
      "description": "Explore the concept of derivatives and their applications.",
      "isCompleted": false,
      "isBookmarked": false
    },
    {
      "moduleId": "103",
      "moduleTitle": "Introduction to Integrals",
      "video": "@/assets/testvideo.mp4",
      "description": "Get a basic understanding of integrals and their use in calculus.",
      "isCompleted": false,
      "isBookmarked": false
    },
    {
      "moduleId": "104",
      "moduleTitle": "The Fundamental Theorem of Calculus",
      "video": "@/assets/testvideo.mp4",
      "description": "Understand the fundamental theorem of calculus, which links derivatives and integrals.",
      "isCompleted": false,
      "isBookmarked": false
    },
    {
      "moduleId": "105",
      "moduleTitle": "Techniques of Differentiation",
      "video": "@/assets/testvideo.mp4",
      "description": "Learn various techniques for differentiating complex functions.",
      "isCompleted": false,
      "isBookmarked": false
    },
    {
      "moduleId": "106",
      "moduleTitle": "Applications of Derivatives",
      "video": "@/assets/testvideo.mp4",
      "description": "Explore real-world applications of derivatives, such as optimization and motion analysis.",
      "isCompleted": false,
      "isBookmarked": false
    },
    {
      "moduleId": "107",
      "moduleTitle": "Techniques of Integration",
      "video": "@/assets/testvideo.mp4",
      "description": "Learn various techniques for integrating complex functions.",
      "isCompleted": false,
      "isBookmarked": false
    },
    {
      "moduleId": "108",
      "moduleTitle": "Applications of Integrals",
      "video": "@/assets/testvideo.mp4",
      "description": "Explore real-world applications of integrals, such as calculating areas and volumes.",
      "isCompleted": false,
      "isBookmarked": false
    },
    {
      "moduleId": "109",
      "moduleTitle": "Sequences and Series",
      "video": "@/assets/testvideo.mp4",
      "description": "Understand the basics of sequences and series, including convergence and divergence.",
      "isCompleted": true,
      "isBookmarked": false
    },
    {
      "moduleId": "110",
      "moduleTitle": "Multivariable Calculus",
      "video": "@/assets/testvideo.mp4",
      "description": "An introduction to calculus with functions of several variables, partial derivatives, and multiple integrals.",
      "isCompleted": false,
      "isBookmarked": false
    }
  ]
